document_data.name: Gwarlor chaka
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gwarlor chaka''' was a prominent [[chaka]] within the [[Shining Lands]] of [[southeast Faer√ªn]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]] and a member of the [[Chakas of 31]].
document_data.Base of Operations: The Gwarlor chaka was based in [[Flyndagol]] in the northeast corner of [[Durpar]].
document_data.Activity: The organization owned mines for both [[gold]] and [[iron]]. They were also involved in woodworking ventures.
